publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-3709 Rob Gibson: GREAN Boost for Golspieâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Golspie Recycling and Environmental Action Network (GREAN) on winning the Member of the Year Award at the Community Recycling Network for Scotland Awards; recognises the vital and excellent work that GREAN provides to the community of east Sutherland as well as to the wider Highlands in running an exemplary recycling business; notes the important contribution that GREAN makes to both Highland and national recycling targets and the jobs that it offers to people in the community; calls for continued grant aid to support this vital social enterprise, and wishes the management and workers continued success and the best for the future. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Bill Kidd, David Stewart, Kenneth Gibson, Angela Constance, Robin Harper, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Patrick Harvie, Mary Scanlon, Alasdair Allan, Sandra White, Brian Adam, Christine Grahame, Maureen Watt, Jamie Stone, Jamie McGrigor*
